channel.title: Bringing back Auxy shirts at Cotton Bureau
channel.description:
I’ve been wanting to get an Auxy shirt since their release but I couldn’t before they were all gone.
There are now 30 requests to bring them back. We only need 40 to make it happen. If you missed out and didn’t get an Auxy shirt, please help us reach 40 by requesting at the following:
https://cottonbureau.com/products/auxy
Thanks guys

item.title: Bringing back Auxy shirts at Cotton Bureau

I’ve been wanting to get an Auxy shirt since their release but I couldn’t before they were all gone.

There are now 30 requests to bring them back. We only need 40 to make it happen. If you missed out and didn’t get an Auxy shirt, please help us reach 40 by requesting at the following:
